Articles.Content: Would it be possible to fly spaceshipone/spaceshiptwo into space - with whiteknight/whiteknight2 still attached?

Nope.

You would need ONE BIG ARSE BOOSTER. (TBH, IDK the mass of whiteknight...)
SS1 could barely reach space as it was, and there's a good chance SS2 actually can't, at least with the current engine.
Its possible if you stick a big rocket on the back.

> 
> Its possible if you stick a big rocket on the back.

No it isn't.

If you would stick a big enough rocket to it WhiteKnight would not be able to take off.

> 
> No it isn't.
> If you would stick a big enough rocket to it WhiteKnight would not be able to take off.

Nodoby said it has to take off under its own power (of the SSO/WK). It can just be strapped to a big rocket as a payload - think Space Shuttle or Buran. I wouldn't write it off as impossible. Impractical, on the other hand... Very much so.
